Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Customer extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a customer in the booking system. Uses an auto-incrementing static counter for unique customer IDs.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String name, String phone, String email)
      Constructor for creating a new Customer. Automatically assigns a unique ID.
      Parameters:
      name - the customer's name
      phone - the customer's phone number
      email - the customer's email address

    • Customer

      public Customer(int id, String name, String phone, String email, boolean deleted)
      Constructor for loading a Customer from storage. Updates the static counter if necessary.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer ID loaded from file
      name - the customer's name
      phone - the customer's phone number
      email - the customer's email address
      deleted - the deletion status

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the unique ID for this customer.
      Returns:
      the customer ID

      Returns the customer's name.

      Returns:

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings()
      Returns a list of all bookings made by this customer.
      Returns:
      the list of bookings

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking)
      Adds a booking to this customer.
      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the booking already exists.

    • cancelBookingForFlight

      public void cancelBookingForFlight(Flight flight)
      Cancels (removes) a booking for the given flight.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight to cancel booking for.

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short string with the customer's basic details: ID, name, phone, email.
      Returns:
      a short detail string

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong()
      Returns a long string with the customer's details plus each booking's short details.
      Returns:
      a multi-line detail string with bookings

    • isDeleted

      public boolean isDeleted()
      Checks whether this customer is marked as deleted.
      Returns:
      true if deleted, false otherwise

    • setDeleted

      public void setDeleted(boolean deleted)
      Marks or unmarks the customer as deleted.
      Parameters:
      deleted - true to mark as deleted, false to restore
